title: Anivia Needs New Skins/ Reworked Skins

embed.description: Personal project Anivia is property of Riot Games

body: I've been playing {{champion:34}}  since I started playing league and own all of her skins. {{champion:34}}  only has 2 skins that have unique particle effects (blackfrost + festival queen). May I suggest possible particles added to {{champion:34}} 's Team Spirit skin. Maybe some red/white in her abilities. I have also attached a link to the idea of Volcanic {{champion:34}} which really looks amazing. Thanks for your time.

replies.body: I would spend $100 for a legendary Anivia skin.

Blackfrost is legendary.

I love Anivia, one of my fav champs, so I'd certainly love more skins for her, but champs don't tend to get legendaries when they already have one.
yes but not a 1820 skin a 1350 would be more appropriate
legal issues with dota 2 Pheonix if they did.
Dota doesn't own any copyright there. They own Phoenix the character, not phoenix the concept.

You might be interested in this little discussion.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/4sEbYwPF-champion-riganimation-anivia-the-cryo-phoenix
